amendatorysection.para: On or before July 1 of each year, the executive director of the Rural Development Commission shall submit to the Department of Economic Development an annual report which includes a summary of the commission's activities, recommendations for future rural development action, and an accounting of the source and use of funds disbursed during the previous fiscal year. The Department of Economic Development shall include such report in the department's annual status report under section 81-1201.11.
